column1: Is your organization doing racial equity work that seeks to create systemic changes in Illinois through programs, policies, or practitioners?
Does your organization provide direct services such as education, housing, meals, or health care, or does it work on policies or programs to impact racial equity? Please select one.
Does your organization work in Illinois?
Please provide your full organization name.

If your organization has another name or acronym that it regularly uses instead of its full name, please type in what that is (For example, the American Civil Liberties Union is regularly known as the ACLU). If no other alternative name is used, write “None” or leave blank.
Please enter your organization's mailing address below. If there is no unit/office/apartment information, please continue without answering that box.
Does your organization serve Illinois statewide, or only in specific regions?
Does your organization service counties in Northern Illinois?
Does your organization service counties in Central Illinois?
Does your organization service counties in Southern Illinois?
